trans-unit.target: 以使用者認證執行 DSC

trans-unit.source: You can run a DSC resource under a specified set of credentials by using the automatic **PsDscRunAsCredential** property in the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在設定中使用自動 **PsDscRunAsCredential** 屬性，以一組指定的認證來執行 DSC 資源。

trans-unit.source: By default, DSC runs each resource as the system account.
trans-unit.target: DSC 預設會使用系統帳戶執行每項資源，

trans-unit.source: There are times when running as a user is necessary, such as installing MSI packages in a specific user context, setting a user's registry keys, accessing a user's specific local directory, or accessing a network share.
trans-unit.target: 但有些時候仍須以使用者身分執行，例如在特定使用者內容中安裝 MSI 封裝；設定使用者的登錄機碼；存取使用者的特定本機目錄；或存取網路共用等等。

trans-unit.source: Every DSC resource has a **PsDscRunAsCredential** property that can be set to any user credentials (a [PSCredential](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms572524(v=VS.85).aspx) object).
trans-unit.target: 每項 DSC 資源都有 **PsDscRunAsCredential** 屬性可設為任何使用者的認證 ([PSCredential](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms572524(v=VS.85).aspx) 物件)。

trans-unit.source: The credential can be hard-coded as the value of the property in the configuration, or you can set the value to [Get-Credential](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh849815.aspx),
trans-unit.target: 此認證可硬式編碼成設定中的屬性值，也可將此值設為 [Get-Credential](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh849815.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: which will prompt the user for a credential when the configuration is compiled (for information about compiling configurations, see [Configurations](configurations.md)
trans-unit.target: 若將此值設為後者，將會在編譯設定時，提示使用者提供認證 (如需如何編譯設定的資訊，請參閱[設定](configurations.md))。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** The **PsDscRunAsCredential** property is not available in PowerShell 4.0.
trans-unit.target: **注意：**PowerShell 4.0 中無法使用 **PsDscRunAsCredential** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, **Get-Credential** is used to prompt the user for credentials.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用了 **Get-Credential** 提示使用者提供認證。

trans-unit.source: The [Registry](registryResource.md) resource is used to change the registry key that specifies the background color
for the Windows command prompt window.
trans-unit.target: Windows 命令提示字元視窗背景色彩的登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This example assumes that you have a valid certificate at `C:\publicKeys\targetNode.cer`, and that the thumbprint of that certificate is the value shown.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**此範例假設您的 `C:\publicKeys\targetNode.cer` 中包含有效的憑證，且該憑證的指紋即是所顯示的值。

trans-unit.source: For information about encrypting credentials in DSC configuration MOF files, see [Securing the MOF file](secureMOF.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需如何在 DSC 設定 MOF 檔案中加密認證的資訊，請參閱[保護 MOF 檔案](secureMOF.md)。
